tables.table_schema:
CREATE TABLE waste_reduction_initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(100),
  implementation_date DATE,
  responsible_person VARCHAR(50),
  waste_reduction_target DECIMAL(10,2)
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_operations (
    operation_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
    operation_name VARCHAR(255),
    start_date DATETIME,
    end_date DATETIME,
    implemented_by VARCHAR(255)
);

CREATE TABLE packaging_operations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name STRING,
  initiative_description STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE waste_reduction_metrics (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_id INT REFERENCES packaging_operations(id),
  metric_name STRING,
  metric_value FLOAT,
  measurement_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE packaging_materials (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name STRING,
  material_type STRING,
  recycle_code INT,
  usage_quantity INT,
  usage_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE packaging_sites (
  site_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  site_name STRING,
  location STRING,
  manager_name STRING
)

CREATE TABLE packaging_materials (
  material_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  material_name STRING,
  recycle_code INT
)

CREATE TABLE waste_reduction_initiatives (
  initiative_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name STRING,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE,
  material_id INT,
  FOREIGN KEY (material_id) REFERENCES packaging_materials(material_id)
)

CREATE TABLE initiative_progress (
  progress_id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_id INT,
  progress_status STRING,
  progress_description STRING,
  FOREIGN KEY (initiative_id) REFERENCES waste_reduction_initiatives(initiative_id)
)

CREATE TABLE WasteReductionInitiatives (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  initiative_name VARCHAR(255),
  description TEXT,
  start_date DATE,
  end_date DATE
)

CREATE TABLE PackagingOperations (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  operation_name VARCHAR(255),
  location VARCHAR(255),
  employee_id INT,
  start_time TIME,
  end_time TIME
)

CREATE TABLE WasteTypes (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_type VARCHAR(255),
  category VARCHAR(255)
)

CREATE TABLE WasteManagement (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  waste_id INT,
  disposal_date DATE,
  disposal_method VARCHAR(255),
  quantity DECIMAL
)

CREATE TABLE Employees (
  id INT PRIMARY KEY,
  employee_name VARCHAR(255),
  department VARCHAR(255),
  position VARCHAR(255)
)
